MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the G44 postcode area of Glasgow affecting properties in Ashcroft Drive and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to complete a repair to an underground cable fault we have had to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6:45pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:54pm on 29th March 2021.
